Name: RASPBERRY MASH
About the game: Fantasy, weapons, violence! 'Roguelike game' in pixel art. A girl who swears to take revenge on God. Using swords, spears, lasers, rocket launchers, and other weapons of different capabilities, defeat the　enemies that stand in your way! Avoid enemy attacks quickly by dodge rolls! It is fun to control with high difficulty action & shooting! Depend on route, can unlocks the way to another ending! Can you get to the true ending? ★Use artifacts, weapons, and various skills! ★You can defeat many monsters in the dungeon at once! ★Pop and violence! Pixel art characters are dead with blood splashes!
